Author: Wesley Runnels
Description:
Performs one-hot encoding on categorical features in a dataframe. The encoder can then be applied to other datasets using the returned executor. See [sklearn's documentation](https://scikit-learn.org/0.24/modules/generated/sklearn.preprocessing.OneHotEncoder.html?highlight=onehot#sklearn.preprocessing.OneHotEncoder) for further information.

Parameters:
- **Columns**: categorical columns to encode
- **Drop method**: whether to drop a category from each column to prevent collinearity
- **Handle unknown method**: behavior when a previously trained encoder encounters a new category
- **Keep original columns**: whether the original categorical columns should be kept
